name: fine_grained_t2i_judgement
description: Fine-grained taxonomy of text-to-image generation quality

classes.name: Aesthetics
classes.description: Overall visual appeal or beauty of the image, factoring in composition, color harmony, stylistic choices, and general impression.

classes.name: Composition
classes.description: Arrangement and balance of elements within the image, including framing and focal points.

classes.name: Color Harmony
classes.description: Overall compatibility and visual balance of colors, such as complementary or analogous color schemes.

classes.name: Artistic Impact
classes.description: Emotional or conceptual resonance of the image, reflecting the effectiveness of aesthetic choices.

classes.name: Textual Properties
classes.description: Characteristics and quality of the prompt or textual input used to generate the image.

classes.name: Text Style
classes.description: The manner or tone in which the textual prompt is written, influencing the creative direction of the image.

classes.name: Length
classes.description: How long or short the textual prompt is, including word count and level of descriptive detail.

classes.name: Brief
classes.description: Extremely concise prompt using minimal words.

classes.name: Moderate
classes.description: Prompt of medium length that provides sufficient context without being overly verbose.

classes.name: Extended
classes.description: Long prompt with detailed descriptions and potentially multiple sentences.

classes.name: Complexity
classes.description: The degree of intricacy or sophistication in the textual prompt, including vocabulary, structure, and conceptual nuance.

classes.name: Simple
classes.description: Straightforward language with no complex sentence structures or advanced terminology.

classes.name: Intermediate
classes.description: Moderate use of descriptive language or specialized terms, striking a balance between clarity and depth.

classes.name: Advanced
classes.description: Contains sophisticated or technical language, nuanced instructions, or layered concepts.

classes.name: Error Types
classes.description: Categories of textual mistakes in the prompt that may affect image generation.

classes.name: Omission
classes.description: Randomly dropping out n% of words in the prompt.

classes.name: Negation
classes.description: Randomly negate one or more verbs in the prompt.

classes.name: Pronoun Error
classes.description: Replace all pronouns in the sentence without causing syntax errors. Semantic errors are allowed.

classes.name: Fluency Errors
classes.description: Errors that impact the overall readability of the prompt.

classes.name: Word Jumble
classes.description: Misspellings or garbled text that make the intended meaning unclear or confusing.

classes.name: Spelling Errors
classes.description: Incorrectly spelled words that may affect the prompt's readability or comprehension.

classes.name: Subject-verb disagreement
classes.description: Mismatch between the subject and verb in the sentence.

classes.name: Visual Properties
classes.description: Characteristics and attributes of the generated image’s content and appearance.

classes.name: Domain
classes.description: High-level medium or approach used in the image (e.g., photography, painting, 3D rendering, anime).

classes.name: Photography
classes.description: Images that appear as if captured by a camera in real-world lighting and conditions.

classes.name: Illustration
classes.description: Flat or stylized artwork typically associated with hand-drawn or digital drawing aesthetics.

classes.name: 3D Rendering
classes.description: Computer-generated graphics that simulate three-dimensional objects and spaces.

classes.name: Anime
classes.description: Images adopting stylized, often character-centric art typical of animation or manga.

classes.name: Mixed Media
classes.description: Hybrid or collage-style images, possibly blending real and illustrated elements.

classes.name: Painting
classes.description: Artwork created using traditional or digital painting techniques.

classes.name: Subject Matter
classes.description: Major categories or types of subjects appearing in the image (e.g., nature, people, architecture).

classes.name: Nature
classes.description: Outdoor or wilderness scenes that highlight natural elements such as mountains, forests, or oceans.

classes.name: Landscapes
classes.description: Vast outdoor scenes showcasing natural features like hills, valleys, rivers, and skies.

entities.name: Mountain
entities.description: A large, towering landform that has steep sides and a peak at the top.

entities.name: Valley
entities.description: A low-lying area between mountains or hills, often appearing as a long stretch of land.

entities.name: River
entities.description: A flowing body of water that usually runs along a channel with banks on each side.

entities.name: Cloud
entities.description: A visible mass of condensed water vapor that often looks soft or fluffy.

classes.name: Flora
classes.description: Plants and vegetation, including trees, flowers, and grasses.

entities.name: Tree
entities.description: A tall plant with a thick trunk made of wood and branches extending outward with leaves.

entities.name: Flower
entities.description: A colorful, often delicate plant structure with petals that grow around a central part.

entities.name: Bush
entities.description: A small to medium-sized plant with multiple branches that usually form dense foliage.

entities.name: Grass
entities.description: A short, thin green plant that grows in clusters of narrow leaves.

classes.name: Fauna
classes.description: Animals and wildlife, ranging from insects to large mammals.

entities.name: Deer
entities.description: A four-legged mammal with a slender body, thin legs, and branched antlers on the males.

entities.name: Eagle
entities.description: A large bird of prey with a sharp, curved beak, strong talons, and broad wings.

entities.name: Butterfly
entities.description: An insect with two pairs of often colorful wings that fold above its body when resting.

entities.name: Fox
entities.description: A small to medium-sized canine with a pointed snout and a bushy tail.

classes.name: Weather Phenomena
classes.description: Visual representations of weather conditions such as rain, snow, storms, or sunshine.

entities.name: Raindrop
entities.description: A small droplet of water that forms in the atmosphere and falls to the ground.

entities.name: Snowflake
entities.description: A tiny crystal of frozen water, often with a unique and intricate shape.

entities.name: Lightning Bolt
entities.description: A bright flash of electricity that appears as a jagged streak of light in the sky.

entities.name: Sunbeam
entities.description: A ray of light from the sun that appears as a bright, narrow beam.

classes.name: Underwater
classes.description: Scenes depicting aquatic environments, marine life, and underwater landscapes.

entities.name: Fish
entities.description: A water-dwelling animal with fins on its body and gills on its sides for breathing.

entities.name: Coral
entities.description: A marine organism that forms branching or rounded structures, often in vibrant colors.

entities.name: Sea Turtle
entities.description: A large reptile with a protective shell covering its back and flippers for swimming.

entities.name: Seaweed
entities.description: A marine plant-like organism that has long, thin fronds and grows in water.

classes.name: People
classes.description: Images primarily depicting one or more human subjects.

classes.name: Portraits
classes.description: Close-up images focusing on individual faces or expressions.

entities.name: Adult Human
entities.description: A person with one head, two arms attached at the shoulders, and two legs extending downward.

entities.name: Child
entities.description: A smaller, younger human with similar features, often appearing with a smaller frame.

entities.name: Elderly Person
entities.description: A mature human with visible signs of age, such as wrinkles, but the same basic body layout.

classes.name: Groups
classes.description: Multiple people interacting or posed together within the scene.

entities.name: Friends
entities.description: A set of human figures, each having one head, two arms, and two legs, appearing in varying ages or appearances.

entities.name: Family Members
entities.description: Related humans of different ages and sizes, each with the basic human form of a head, torso, arms, and legs.

entities.name: Crowd
entities.description: A larger collection of humans with the same general structure, showing variety in appearance.

classes.name: Activities
classes.description: People engaged in various actions or tasks, such as sports, work, or leisure.

entities.name: Athlete
entities.description: A human with a muscular or fit form, one head, two arms, and two legs often wearing sports attire.

entities.name: Worker
entities.description: A human dressed in work clothes or uniforms, with a body layout of a head, torso, arms, and legs.

entities.name: Hobbyist
entities.description: A person with typical human features, often holding or using items related to a pastime.

classes.name: Cultural
classes.description: Depictions reflecting specific cultures, traditions, or ethnic backgrounds.

entities.name: Traditional Dancer
entities.description: A human in culturally specific attire, with the same basic body structure of a head, arms, and legs.

entities.name: Musician
entities.description: A human figure possibly holding or playing a musical instrument, with one head, two arms, and two legs.

entities.name: Elder in Traditional Clothing
entities.description: An older human wearing culturally distinct garments, maintaining the human form of head and limbs.

classes.name: Animals
classes.description: Images focused on animals—wild or domestic.

classes.name: Wild Animals
classes.description: Non-domesticated species typically found in natural habitats.

entities.name: Lion
entities.description: A large, four-legged carnivore with a muscular body and a mane around its head (in males).

entities.name: Elephant
entities.description: A massive, four-legged mammal with thick, grey skin, a long trunk, and two tusks.

entities.name: Giraffe
entities.description: A tall, spotted animal with four legs, a very long neck, and small horns on its head.

classes.name: Domestic Animals
classes.description: Animals that are commonly kept as pets or farm animals.

entities.name: Dog
entities.description: A four-legged pet with fur, a tail, and ears that can be floppy or upright.

entities.name: Cat
entities.description: A small, agile pet with soft fur, pointed ears, and a long, flexible tail.

entities.name: Cow
entities.description: A large farm animal with four legs, a broad body, and two horns on its head.

classes.name: Mythical Creatures
classes.description: Fantastical or legendary animals from folklore and mythology.

entities.name: Dragon
entities.description: A reptile-like creature often depicted with scales, wings, and the ability to breathe fire.

entities.name: Phoenix
entities.description: A mythical bird with bright feathers and a crest, often associated with flames or rebirth.

entities.name: Unicorn
entities.description: A horse-like creature with a single spiral horn protruding from its forehead.

classes.name: Architecture
classes.description: Scenes emphasizing buildings, cities, or other man-made structures.

classes.name: Residential Buildings
classes.description: Houses, apartments, and other living spaces.

entities.name: House
entities.description: A structure with walls, a roof, and windows, often featuring a simple rectangular shape.

entities.name: Cottage
entities.description: A small dwelling usually made of wood or stone, with a cozy appearance and a pitched roof.

entities.name: Apartment Block
entities.description: A tall, multi-level building divided into separate living units with rows of windows.

classes.name: Commercial Buildings
classes.description: Structures like offices, shops, and skyscrapers.

entities.name: Office Tower
entities.description: A large, tall structure with many floors and a facade made of glass or concrete.

entities.name: Shopping Mall
entities.description: A wide complex containing multiple shops, usually with a main entrance and corridors inside.

entities.name: Skyscraper
entities.description: A very tall, multi-story building often made of steel and glass that reaches high into the sky.

classes.name: Historical Landmarks
classes.description: Iconic or culturally significant buildings and monuments.

entities.name: Castle
entities.description: A large, fortified building with thick walls, towers, and battlements.

entities.name: Temple
entities.description: A place of worship, often featuring columns, ornate detailing, and symbolic decorations.

entities.name: Monument
entities.description: A structure erected to commemorate a person or event, usually made of stone or metal.

classes.name: Bridges and Infrastructure
classes.description: Man-made structures connecting different areas, such as bridges, roads, and railways.

entities.name: Bridge
entities.description: A structure built to span a gap or obstacle, often with supports below or arches.

entities.name: Road
entities.description: A paved or cleared path designed for vehicles or foot traffic, usually long and flat.

entities.name: Railway Tracks
entities.description: Parallel steel rails laid on wooden or concrete sleepers for trains to travel on.

classes.name: Objects and Still Life
classes.description: Arrangements or depictions of inanimate objects (e.g., fruits, flowers, household items).

classes.name: Household Items
classes.description: Common objects found in homes, such as furniture, appliances, and decor.

entities.name: Chair
entities.description: A piece of furniture with a seat, a backrest, and often four legs.

entities.name: Lamp
entities.description: A device that holds a light bulb, typically with a base and a shade.

entities.name: Couch
entities.description: A padded piece of furniture designed for seating multiple people, usually with armrests.

classes.name: Food and Beverages
classes.description: Edible items and drinks, often arranged aesthetically.

entities.name: Fruit Bowl
entities.description: A container that holds various fresh fruits, each with distinct shapes and colors.

entities.name: Cup of Coffee
entities.description: A small container with a handle, filled with a dark, aromatic hot beverage.

entities.name: Loaf of Bread
entities.description: A solid baked product made from dough, typically shaped into a rounded or rectangular form.

classes.name: Artistic Arrangements
classes.description: Carefully composed displays of objects for artistic effect.

entities.name: Vase of Flowers
entities.description: A tall container holding a collection of blooms with stems and leaves.

entities.name: Decorative Bowl
entities.description: A shallow, often ornate dish used to hold small items or purely for display.

entities.name: Sculpture
entities.description: A three-dimensional piece of art created from materials like stone, metal, or clay.

classes.name: Tools and Instruments
classes.description: Various tools, machinery, or musical instruments depicted in the image.

entities.name: Hammer
entities.description: A handheld tool with a weighted head fixed to a handle for striking surfaces.

entities.name: Guitar
entities.description: A stringed musical instrument with a long neck and a hollow or solid body.

entities.name: Camera
entities.description: A device with a lens, a body, and buttons, used to capture photographs or videos.

classes.name: Fantasy/Sci-Fi
classes.description: Imagery featuring mythical or futuristic elements, creatures, or environments.

classes.name: Mythical Worlds
classes.description: Imagined realms inspired by mythology and fantasy literature.

entities.name: Enchanted Forest
entities.description: A woodland setting with unusually vibrant or glowing plants and mystical ambiance.

entities.name: Floating Island
entities.description: A piece of land that appears to hover in the air without visible support.

entities.name: Crystal Cave
entities.description: A cavern filled with glimmering or translucent rock formations that catch the light.

classes.name: Futuristic Cities
classes.description: Advanced urban environments with high-tech architecture and infrastructure.

entities.name: Neon Tower
entities.description: A tall building featuring bright, illuminated panels or glowing lines along its exterior.

entities.name: Hover Car
entities.description: A vehicle-like structure that appears to float above the ground, with a sleek, streamlined shape.

entities.name: Robot Citizen
entities.description: A mechanical being shaped somewhat like a human, with a metallic body and jointed limbs.

classes.name: Space and Celestial
classes.description: Outer space scenes, including stars, planets, and spacecraft.

entities.name: Alien Creature
entities.description: A fictional being with unusual shapes, limbs, or features not found in typical Earth animals.

entities.name: Starship
entities.description: A large vehicle designed for travel through the vacuum of space, often metallic and sleek.

entities.name: Asteroid
entities.description: A rocky or metallic object floating through space, usually irregular in shape.

classes.name: Magic and Sorcery
classes.description: Elements involving magical practices, spells, or enchanted objects.

entities.name: Wizard
entities.description: A human-like figure known for casting spells, often seen with robes and a staff.

entities.name: Magic Wand
entities.description: A thin, rod-like object used as a focus for magical energies or spells.

entities.name: Enchanted Book
entities.description: A volume filled with mystical symbols, often glowing or shimmering on its cover.

classes.name: Vehicles
classes.description: Depictions of various modes of transportation and machinery.

classes.name: Land Vehicles
classes.description: Cars, motorcycles, bicycles, and other vehicles that travel on land.

entities.name: Car
entities.description: A four-wheeled motor vehicle with a metal body and seats for passengers.

entities.name: Motorcycle
entities.description: A two-wheeled motorized vehicle with a saddle seat and handlebars.

entities.name: Bicycle
entities.description: A two-wheeled vehicle powered by pedals attached to a chain and gears.

classes.name: Air Vehicles
classes.description: Planes, helicopters, drones, and other airborne transportation.

entities.name: Airplane
entities.description: A powered flying vehicle with fixed wings and engines, typically carrying passengers or cargo.

entities.name: Helicopter
entities.description: An aircraft with rotating blades on top that allow it to take off and land vertically.

entities.name: Drone
entities.description: A small, unmanned aircraft with multiple rotors and a compact body.

classes.name: Water Vehicles
classes.description: Boats, ships, submarines, and other vessels that navigate water.

entities.name: Boat
entities.description: A small vessel designed to float on water, typically with a hull and seating area.

entities.name: Ship
entities.description: A large watercraft with a strong hull and multiple decks, used for travel or transport.

entities.name: Submarine
entities.description: A submerged vessel designed for underwater travel, usually with a tubular body and fins.

classes.name: Futuristic Vehicles
classes.description: Imagined or advanced transportation methods not commonly seen in the real world.

entities.name: Hoverboard
entities.description: A small platform that hovers above the ground, often depicted with futuristic styling.

entities.name: Flying Car
entities.description: A hybrid vehicle that combines the features of a car and an aircraft, allowing it to soar.

entities.name: Monorail Pod
entities.description: A sleek, single-track vehicle with a rounded exterior, typically gliding on an elevated rail.

classes.name: Technology
classes.description: Images showcasing technological devices, gadgets, and innovations.

classes.name: Electronic Devices
classes.description: Gadgets like smartphones, laptops, and tablets.

entities.name: Smartphone
entities.description: A handheld device with a touchscreen and a rectangular body, used for calls and apps.

entities.name: Laptop
entities.description: A portable computer with a hinged screen and built-in keyboard.

entities.name: Tablet
entities.description: A thin, flat device with a touchscreen that typically has no physical keyboard.

classes.name: Robotics
classes.description: Mechanical robots and automated machinery.

entities.name: Humanoid Robot
entities.description: A machine shaped like a human, with a head, torso, and limbs made of metal or plastic.

entities.name: Industrial Robot Arm
entities.description: A mechanical limb with multiple joints, often used for assembly or manufacturing tasks.

entities.name: Robotic Vacuum
entities.description: A small, disk-shaped device that moves around on wheels, cleaning floors automatically.

classes.name: Artificial Intelligence
classes.description: Visual representations of AI concepts, such as virtual assistants or neural networks.

entities.name: AI Avatar
entities.description: A digital figure or face displayed on a screen, often representing an intelligent system.

entities.name: Neural Network Diagram
entities.description: An illustration of interconnected nodes and lines, representing AI decision-making paths.

entities.name: Chatbot Interface
entities.description: A minimalistic display with text bubbles, indicating automated conversation or messaging.

classes.name: Wearable Technology
classes.description: Devices worn on the body, like smartwatches and VR headsets.

entities.name: Smartwatch
entities.description: A small, rectangular or circular device worn on the wrist, displaying digital information.

entities.name: VR Headset
entities.description: A goggle-like device that covers the eyes, often with straps and internal displays for immersive visuals.

entities.name: Fitness Tracker
entities.description: A slim wristband or watch-like device that monitors physical activities and health metrics.

classes.name: Abstract
classes.description: Non-representational imagery focusing on shapes, colors, and forms without depicting specific objects.

classes.name: Geometric Abstraction
classes.description: Use of geometric shapes and patterns in a non-representational manner.

entities.name: Circle
entities.description: A simple curved shape with a continuous line forming a round outline.

entities.name: Square
entities.description: A shape with four equal straight sides and four right angles.

entities.name: Triangle
entities.description: A shape with three straight edges and three corners.

classes.name: Color Fields
classes.description: Large expanses of single colors or gradients without distinct forms.

entities.name: Solid Block of Color
entities.description: A broad, even area of a single hue with no visible patterns or textures.

entities.name: Gradient Swatch
entities.description: A smooth transition from one color to another, often blending gradually.

entities.name: Subtle Texture Overlay
entities.description: A faint pattern or grain that adds slight variation to a primarily uniform color.

classes.name: Conceptual Abstraction
classes.description: Images representing abstract ideas or concepts through symbolic means.

entities.name: Symbolic Shape
entities.description: A simple outline suggesting an idea or concept, such as a circle or spiral.

entities.name: Minimalist Line Art
entities.description: A few drawn lines or curves that imply a broader concept or theme.

entities.name: Abstract Symbol
entities.description: A stylized image with no direct representation, often open to interpretation.

classes.name: Events
classes.description: Depictions of specific occurrences or happenings, often capturing dynamic moments.

classes.name: Festivals and Celebrations
classes.description: Scenes from cultural festivals, parties, and other celebratory events.

entities.name: Fireworks
entities.description: Colorful explosives that create bright patterns of light in the sky.

entities.name: Confetti
entities.description: Small pieces of paper or foil in various colors, usually thrown for celebration.

entities.name: Traditional Costume
entities.description: An outfit that reflects cultural heritage, including distinctive patterns and accessories.

classes.name: Sports Events
classes.description: Action-packed moments from various sports activities.

entities.name: Soccer Ball
entities.description: A spherical object typically covered in black and white panels, used for the game of soccer.

entities.name: Basketball Hoop
entities.description: A circular metal ring with a net attached, used for the game of basketball.

entities.name: Racing Helmet
entities.description: A protective covering for the head, often streamlined for activities like car or motorbike racing.

classes.name: Concerts and Performances
classes.description: Live performances, music concerts, and theatrical shows.

entities.name: Stage Lights
entities.description: Bright lamps or spotlights used to illuminate performers on a stage.

entities.name: Microphone
entities.description: A handheld or stand-mounted device that amplifies a speaker’s or singer’s voice.

entities.name: Musical Instrument
entities.description: A device used to produce music, such as a guitar, violin, or drum.

classes.name: Historical Events
classes.description: Recreations or representations of significant moments from history.

entities.name: Vintage Clothing
entities.description: Older-style garments reflecting a past era, often with different cuts and fabrics than modern wear.

entities.name: Old-fashioned Flag
entities.description: A banner with historic or traditional markings, sometimes featuring faded colors.

entities.name: Antique Weapon
entities.description: A tool or device used for combat in earlier times, often crafted from metal and wood.

classes.name: Space
classes.description: Imagery related to outer space, celestial bodies, and astronomical phenomena.

classes.name: Planets and Moons
classes.description: Depictions of celestial bodies within and beyond our solar system.

entities.name: Earth
entities.description: A sphere with blue oceans, green or brown landmasses, and white cloud patterns.

entities.name: Moon
entities.description: A round, cratered celestial body, usually pale grey or white in appearance.

entities.name: Ringed Planet
entities.description: A large, spherical planet encircled by a flat, ring-shaped collection of particles.

classes.name: Stars and Galaxies
classes.description: Vast expanses of stars, nebulae, and galactic formations.

entities.name: Star Cluster
entities.description: A group of small, bright points of light close together against a dark background.

entities.name: Galaxy Spiral
entities.description: A broad, swirling shape with arms trailing around a bright center.

entities.name: Nebula
entities.description: A colorful, cloud-like formation of gas and dust illuminated in space.

classes.name: Spacecraft and Satellites
classes.description: Vehicles and devices used for space exploration and communication.

entities.name: Rocket
entities.description: A tall, cylindrical craft that propels itself using powerful engines to leave a planet’s surface.

entities.name: Space Shuttle
entities.description: A reusable spacecraft with wings and an aerodynamic body designed for orbital travel.

entities.name: Satellite
entities.description: A machine placed in orbit around a celestial body, often with solar panels and antennas.

classes.name: Astronomical Events
classes.description: Occurrences such as eclipses, meteor showers, and supernovas.

entities.name: Solar Eclipse
entities.description: A dark disc passing over the sun, creating a ring or total blockage of sunlight.

entities.name: Meteor
entities.description: A bright streak of light caused by a small object burning up as it enters the atmosphere.

entities.name: Comet
entities.description: A celestial body with a glowing head and a trailing, bright tail of dust and gas.

classes.name: Historical
classes.description: Images reflecting specific time periods, styles, or events from history.

classes.name: Ancient Civilizations
classes.description: Scenes inspired by societies like Ancient Egypt, Rome, or Greece.

entities.name: Pyramid
entities.description: A massive structure with a square base and four triangular sides meeting at a point.

entities.name: Greek Column
entities.description: A tall, cylindrical pillar with fluted sides and an ornate capital at the top.

entities.name: Roman Helmet
entities.description: A metal headgear with a crest or plume, used by Roman soldiers in ancient times.

classes.name: Medieval
classes.description: Depictions of the Middle Ages, including castles, knights, and feudal settings.

entities.name: Knight Armor
entities.description: A protective metal suit covering the entire body, often with a visor on the helmet.

entities.name: Medieval Sword
entities.description: A long metal blade with a handle, used in close combat during the Middle Ages.

entities.name: Castle Gate
entities.description: A large wooden or metal entrance set within thick walls, typically part of a fortress.

classes.name: Industrial Era
classes.description: Imagery reflecting the Industrial Revolution with factories, machinery, and urbanization.

entities.name: Steam Engine
entities.description: A machine powered by boiling water and steam pressure, featuring a large boiler.

entities.name: Factory Chimney
entities.description: A tall brick or metal tower emitting smoke, connected to industrial buildings.

entities.name: Steam Locomotive
entities.description: A railway engine fueled by coal or wood, generating steam to drive its pistons.

classes.name: Modern History
classes.description: Scenes from the 20th and 21st centuries, including contemporary settings and events.

entities.name: Old Television Set
entities.description: A box-like device with a small, rounded screen and dials on the front.

entities.name: Vintage Car
entities.description: A motor vehicle from past decades with a classic body style and chrome details.

entities.name: Modern Skyscraper
entities.description: A tall building featuring large glass panels and a sleek, contemporary shape.

classes.name: Everyday Life
classes.description: Ordinary, day-to-day activities and settings that reflect common human experiences.

classes.name: Home and Family
classes.description: Scenes depicting domestic life, family interactions, and household settings.

entities.name: Parent
entities.description: An adult human figure responsible for caring for children, with one head and limbs.

entities.name: Child
entities.description: A young human figure with smaller proportions but the same basic body structure.

entities.name: Family Pet
entities.description: A domestic animal, such as a dog or cat, that shares a home with humans.

classes.name: Work and Office
classes.description: Depictions of professional environments and workplace activities.

entities.name: Office Desk
entities.description: A flat surface with drawers or compartments, used for work or study.

entities.name: Computer
entities.description: An electronic device with a monitor, keyboard, and system unit for processing tasks.

entities.name: Office Chair
entities.description: A seat often on wheels, with a cushioned backrest and adjustable height.

classes.name: Leisure and Hobbies
classes.description: Activities people engage in during their free time, such as reading, cooking, or gardening.

entities.name: Book
entities.description: A set of written pages bound together inside a cover, often rectangular in shape.

entities.name: Cooking Utensils
entities.description: Tools used in preparing meals, such as spoons, spatulas, and ladles.

entities.name: Gardening Tools
entities.description: Implements like trowels and shears for maintaining or planting in outdoor spaces.

classes.name: Transportation
classes.description: Daily commutes, public transportation, and personal travel scenarios.

entities.name: Bus
entities.description: A large vehicle with rows of seats, used for carrying many passengers.

entities.name: Train
entities.description: A series of connected vehicles running on tracks, typically carrying passengers or cargo.

entities.name: Taxi
entities.description: A car, usually marked or painted distinctively, used for paid passenger transport.

classes.name: Relation
classes.description: How elements in the image interact, connect, or are positioned relative to each other.

classes.name: Action
classes.description: Depictions of movement or activity within the image (e.g., running, waving, dancing).

classes.name: Gesture
classes.description: Smaller-scale movements like hand waves, pointing, or facial expressions.

classes.name: Pointing
classes.description: Extending a finger or object to direct attention toward something.

classes.name: Waving
classes.description: Moving the hand or arm to greet or signal.

classes.name: Facial Expression
classes.description: Communicating emotion or intent through the face (e.g., smiling, frowning).

classes.name: Nodding
classes.description: Up-and-down head movement, often indicating agreement or acknowledgment.

classes.name: Full-Body Movement
classes.description: Actions involving the entire figure’s motion or dynamic poses.

classes.name: Running
classes.description: Quick forward movement using legs in a stride.

classes.name: Dancing
classes.description: Rhythmic or expressive body movements, often set to music.

classes.name: Jumping
classes.description: Propelling the entire body upward or forward, leaving the ground.

classes.name: Swimming
classes.description: Moving through water using arms and legs.

classes.name: Spatial
classes.description: Positional relationships between objects or entities, including perspective and overall composition.

classes.name: Foreground/Background
classes.description: Distinction of depth, with objects placed prominently in the front or receding in the back.

classes.name: Foreground Emphasis
classes.description: Object(s) drawn or photographed in sharp focus or larger scale to highlight importance.

classes.name: Midground Placement
classes.description: Object(s) positioned at an intermediate depth, balancing foreground and background.

classes.name: Background Silhouette
classes.description: Object(s) placed further away, potentially in less detail or lighter focus.

classes.name: Proximity/Overlap
classes.description: Objects partially overlapping or placed close/far from one another.

classes.name: Close Proximity
classes.description: Objects near each other without necessarily overlapping.

classes.name: Overlapping Forms
classes.description: One object partially covers another.

classes.name: Left-of
classes.description: An object positioned to the left side relative to another object (from the viewer’s perspective).

classes.name: Right-of
classes.description: An object positioned to the right side relative to another object (from the viewer’s perspective).

classes.name: Above
classes.description: An object located higher than another object in the composition.

classes.name: Below
classes.description: An object located lower than another object in the composition.

classes.name: Inside
classes.description: An object located within another object.

classes.name: Scale
classes.description: Relative sizes or proportions of objects in the scene, such as one object being larger than another.

classes.name: Exaggerated
classes.description: Deliberate distortion of size, making some objects abnormally large or small.

classes.name: Giant Figures
classes.description: Figures depicted at an unusually large scale compared to the environment.

classes.name: Miniature Objects
classes.description: Objects significantly smaller than their typical real-world size.

classes.name: Distorted Perspective
classes.description: Using extreme angles or vantage points to amplify or shrink perceived size.

classes.name: Realistic Scale
classes.description: Accurate proportions and relative sizes compared to real-world standards.

classes.name: Life-Size Representation
classes.description: Depicting figures or objects in standard human-scale or natural proportions.

classes.name: Proportional Figures
classes.description: Figures shown with typical body proportions relative to each other.

classes.name: Consistent Depth
classes.description: Objects remain in correct relative sizes as they recede or advance in the composition.

classes.name: Attribute
classes.description: Specific qualities of the image or objects within it, ranging from visual style to materials used.

classes.name: Color
classes.description: Hue, saturation, and brightness of elements in the image, including overall color palette.

classes.name: Monochrome
classes.description: Use of a single color or grayscale for a unified palette.

classes.name: Vibrant
classes.description: Bright, saturated colors used prominently.

classes.name: Red
classes.description: Containing the color red.

classes.name: Blue
classes.description: Containing the color blue.

classes.name: Green
classes.description: Containing the color green.

classes.name: Yellow
classes.description: Containing the color yellow.

classes.name: Purple
classes.description: Containing the color purple.

classes.name: Orange
classes.description: Containing the color orange.

classes.name: Pink
classes.description: Containing the color pink.

classes.name: Brown
classes.description: Containing the color brown.

classes.name: Black
classes.description: Containing the color black.

classes.name: White
classes.description: Containing the color white.

classes.name: Texture
classes.description: The perceived surface characteristics (e.g., smooth, rough, metallic) of objects in the image.

classes.name: Smooth
classes.description: Flat or glossy surfaces without noticeable bumps or grain.

classes.name: Rough
classes.description: Visibly coarse or uneven surfaces, as in wood grain or stone.

classes.name: Reflective
classes.description: Shiny surfaces that mirror surroundings, like metal or glass.

classes.name: Shape
classes.description: The form or outline of objects, including geometrical structure and silhouettes.

classes.name: Geometric
classes.description: Objects with clear angular or rounded geometry, such as circles, squares, or polygons.

classes.name: Organic
classes.description: Soft or irregular outlines reminiscent of forms found in nature.

classes.name: Style
classes.description: Artistic or aesthetic manner in which the image is rendered (e.g., realistic, cartoonish, impressionistic).

classes.name: Realistic
classes.description: Rendered to closely mimic real-world appearances, lighting, and textures.

classes.name: Impressionistic
classes.description: Painterly style with loose brushstrokes or abstract representation of forms.

classes.name: Minimalist
classes.description: Simplified or pared-down compositions with a focus on essential elements.

classes.name: Material
classes.description: What objects appear to be made of (wood, metal, plastic, etc.) and how those materials are visually represented.

classes.name: Metallic
classes.description: Shiny, reflective surfaces like steel or gold.

classes.name: Wooden
classes.description: Surfaces with wood grain or organic textures.

classes.name: Fabric
classes.description: Textiles such as cotton, silk, or wool with a visually recognizable weave.

classes.name: Plastic
classes.description: Smooth, synthetic surfaces with a uniform appearance.

classes.name: Glass
classes.description: Transparent or translucent material with reflective properties.

classes.name: Stone
classes.description: Rough, solid surfaces like granite or marble.

classes.name: Paper
classes.description: Thin, flat material with a fibrous texture, often used for writing or printing.

classes.name: Lighting
classes.description: Illumination within the scene, including highlights, shadows, and directional or ambient light sources.

classes.name: Natural Light
classes.description: Sunlight or soft ambient illumination reflecting a natural environment.

classes.name: Artificial Light
classes.description: Lighting that appears to come from lamps, neon signs, or other man-made sources.

classes.name: High Contrast
classes.description: Strong differentiation between light and dark areas, creating pronounced shadows.

classes.name: Layout
classes.description: Arrangement and organization of elements in the image, including framing and use of space.

classes.name: Centered
classes.description: Key subject(s) placed prominently in the center of the frame.

classes.name: Rule of Thirds
classes.description: Composition aligning subjects with imaginary grid lines for visual balance.

classes.name: Asymmetrical
classes.description: Deliberate imbalance in placement of elements for a dynamic or informal composition.
